spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate. Door placements match the 2D plan precisely. Minor misalignment in the living room's southern wall thickness relative to the entry foyer.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity with no missing or hallucinated rooms. Wall adjacency is preserved perfectly across the central hallway.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is mostly accurate. The living room sofa was replaced with individual armchairs and a coffee table (E5), deviating from the L-shaped sectional in the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality orthographic/top-down render. Lighting is soft and consistent. Material textures are clean but slightly muted.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated armchairs and coffee table in living area instead of designated L-shaped sectional sofa.
Minor proportion distortion in the thickness of the internal walls surrounding the primary bedroom (right).
Rendering artifact in the door swing arcs which appear as solid semi-transparent shapes rather than line work.
